title: For Trade: t206 Zach Wheat w/ Tolstoi overprint
author: Frankthetank

posts.post_title: For Trade: t206 Zach Wheat w/ Tolstoi overprint
posts.post_content:
I have a T206 Zach Wheat with Tolstoi overprint that I’m looking to trade.  It is Tolstoi back and the overprint is on the front of the card.  My son is collecting “beater” t206’s and pretty much just looking to trade it to get cards to add to his collection

[IMG]http://pic100.picturetrail.com/VOL780/12764950/22710131/378100810.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://pic100.picturetrail.com/VOL780/12764950/22710131/378100806.jpg[/IMG]
